ðŸ“– Summary: ByteSync is an open-source file synchronization tool that prioritizes security and efficiency. It offers end-to-end encryption, delta transfers, and customizable rules for syncing files across up to five devices. The server component runs in the cloud, simplifying deployment and management, and clients are available for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
